alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Eastern Ulster; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 1:22PM EST until March 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Total snow accumulation of 2 to 6 inches. The higher totals will likely be in the Helderbergs and the Taconics, as well as southern Vermont. * WHERE...Southern Vermont and the Greater Capital Region, Taconics, Helderbergs and and mid Hudson Valley in eastern New York. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates this afternoon will be in the 1 inch an hour or greater range in any heavy snow bands.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
